mount(bytes32,string,string,int256,strin.notice: Mount a concept view into a host at a given zone and level.

ready(bytes32).notice: Mark a mounted host as ready.

setError(bytes32,string).notice: Set an error state on a host.

trackResource(bytes32,string,string).notice: Track a resource associated with a host.

unmount(bytes32).notice: Unmount a host, tearing down its resources.
